titleStmt.title: The arte and science of preseruing bodie and soule in healthe, wisedome, and Catholike religion phisically, philosophically, and diuinely deuised: by Iohn Iones phisition. Right profitable for all persones: but chiefly for princes, rulers, nobles, byshoppes, preachers, parents, and them of the Parliament house.
titleStmt.author: Jones, John, physician.

titleStmt.title: The arte and science of preseruing bodie and soule in healthe, wisedome, and Catholike religion phisically, philosophically, and diuinely deuised: by Iohn Iones phisition. Right profitable for all persones: but chiefly for princes, rulers, nobles, byshoppes, preachers, parents, and them of the Parliament house.
titleStmt.author: Jones, John, physician.

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Of the preseruation of bodie and soule.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
